name: APO-DZ for Android
tagline: Android application for Alpha Phi Omega's Delta Zeta Chapter.
body:
#  APO-DZ
Our Android app interfaces with our Google Calendars and multiple Google spreadsheets as a mobile interface for service project signup, event viewing, our chapter directories, and the reporting forms we use to run our infrastructure.

## Download
Check it out on the [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.upennapo.app)!

The source code is available at [our repository](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-Android).

## Authors and Contributors
[Dean Wilhelmi](@turniphead) and [Ronald Martin](@ronaldsmartin) started building this at [Pennapps 2014](http://2014s.pennapps.com/) with contributions from Han Lianhan.

Thank you to Daniela Lissandrello for helping us create our internal images and Nikila Dandapani for designing the app icon.

## Support or Contact
Please contact us at developer@upennapo.org with any questions or concerns. We are especially happy to help brothers from other chapters set up the infrastructure they need to produce similar apps.

## About our Chapter
The Delta Zeta chapter is based at the University of Pennsylvania. Please visit [our website](upennapo.org) for more information.

## Privacy
No information that you enter into the app leaves your phone. Ever.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
